5th october 20111

P90 changes

advanced Rs and SS - to give better control at 10M and 17MHz

ss needs to move earlier for some reason at high er PAg settings.



17:59 03/02/2011CCD97 on iXon Xtreme.

Updates from 24th January by Paul Mc Grotty

//Speeds are re-assigned from iXon+:
//10MHz --> 16.66MHz
//5MHz --> 10MHz
//3MHz unchanged
//1MHz unchanged

 Speeds now correctly named. 
//                                     
Questions ?
Why are the HBIN2 patterns sometimes very short ? 8 x 10nS  
                                                
Why do some of the Conventional Patterns have Reset samples at strange places

Why is there no Amp restore pulse in some of the amp restore patterns ?
                                               
//

2 phase device with I1=I2, I3=I4, S1=S2, S3=S4
For iXon 97BI 10/5/3/1 MHz with dual channels of ADC 16 bit LTC2207 @ 100 MHz,
for both EM and conventional outputs.
Important for horz clks to have 90% overlap, if not done in pattern then in verniers.

IMO implant is under Image 2?.
Sequence is I1, I2, I3 down towards the shift reg.
Image 3 is last row before shift reg.
Charge is transfered into R1 and R2 with R3 aligned with channel stops.
Sequence is: Node, OG, R3, R2, R1, R3...
S1 to S4	Storage area clks
I1 to I4	Image area clks
B		Engine branch bit
SB1 to SP4	Engine loop speed bits (1+2exp(n-1))
RST		CCD reset
SCP		Scope mode output (for diagnostics)
HVF		EMCCD HV falling edge
AR1/2		Input amp restore, channel 1 and 2
DMP		Horz reg Dump gate
HVR		EMCCD HV rising edge
R1 to R3	Horz register clks
CG2/3		Clamp-to-ground 2 and 3 (there is no 1 anymore!)
MUX		Mux between analog channels
ARM		ARM engine output
FIR		FIRE engine output
SHT		Shutter engine output
SST		Substrate toggle
EMK		EM gain kill
PA1/2		Pre amp gains overide of main software
FRA		FRAME engine output
RS		Reset sample (D-CDS)
SS		Signal sample (D-CDS)
ODK		OD kill (stop CCD output amp glow)
CG2		Clamp-to-ground on analog channel 2
PXL		Valid output pixel clk
SW		Summing well clk
****************************************************************************************

Digitization=16

00000000	11111100	22221111	33222222	33333333	44444444
76543210	54321098	32109876	10987654	98765432	76543210

SIIBSSSS	SSI-ISRS	--H-AAD-	HC-RR-AM	-EF-SPSF	RSROCPPS
441 PPPP	123 23SC	  V RRM 	VG 31 RU	 MI SAHR	SS2DGAXW
    3210	      TP	  F 12P 	R3    MX	 KR T1TA	   K22L
<VS-st>
00000000	11000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	11000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	11000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	11000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10000000	11000110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10000000	11000110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10000000	00000110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10000000	00000110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10000000	00000110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10010000	00000110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\VS-st>

<VS-all>
00100000	11001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	11001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	11001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	11001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11100000	11101110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11100000	11101110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11000000	00100110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11000000	00100110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11000000	00100110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11010000	00100110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\VS-all>

<VS-stH>
00000000	11000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	11000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	11000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	11000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10000000	11000110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10000000	11000110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10000000	00000110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10000000	00000110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10000000	00000110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
10010000	00000110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\VS-stH>

<VS-allH>
00100000	11001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	11001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	11001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	11001010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11100000	11101110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11100000	11101110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11000000	00100110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11000000	00100110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11000000	00100110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
11010000	00100110	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\VS-allH>

SIIBSSSS	SSI-ISRS	--H-AAD-	HC-RR-AM	-EF-SPSF	RSROTPPS
441 PPPP	123 23SC	  V RRM 	VG 31 RU	 MI SAHR	SS2DAAXW
    3210	      TP	  F 12P 	R3    MX	 KR T1TA	   KG2L
Used to generate 6.5us delay for better hole transport in BIs.
<PDT>
00101001	11001000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00101001	11001000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00100000	11001000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00110000	11001000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\PDT>

Keep RST on long enough to supress transients from S clks.
Allow 330ns for transients to decay, then RST off, then AmpRst for at least 100ns.
<VH>
00000110	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000011	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000110	00000000	00001100	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000011	00000000	00000000	10001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00010000	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\VH>

<HV>
00000000	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00010000	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
<\HV>

    3210	      TP	  F 12P 	R3    MX	 KR T1TA	   K22L
<HS1C17>
00000000	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000000	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000000	00000010	00000000	10000000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00000010	00000000	00000000	00000000	10100000
00000000	00000000	00000000	00010000	00000000	00000000
00010000	00000000	00100000	00010000	00000000	00000000
<\HS1C17>

500ns long to allow time for AmpRst and leave a round number for exposure calculations.
(Removed for now)
<HS-EXP1C17>
00000000	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000000	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000000	00000010	00000000	10000000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00000010	00000000	00000000	00000000	10100000
00000000	00000000	00000000	00010000	00000000	00000000
00010000	00000000	00100000	00010000	00000000	00000000
<\HS-EXP1C17>

00000000	00000001	00000000	00010000	00000000	00000000

    3210	      TP	  F 12P 	R3    MX	 KR T1TA	   K22L

00000000	00000001	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000000	00000011	00000000	00000000	00000000	00100000
00010000	00000011	00000000	00000000	00000000	00100000
<\HS1C10>

500ns long to allow time for AmpRst and leave a round number for exposure calculations.
(Removed for now because its lower speed allows SR to cool during long exposures)
<HS-EXP1C10>
00000000	00000001	00000000	00010000	00000000	00000000

(Removed for now because its lower speed allows SR to cool during long exposures)

3MHz conventional starts here.

<HS1C3-HR>
00000100	00000000	00000000	00000000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00000000	00000000	00000000	00000000	00100000
00000001	00000000	00000000	00000000	00000000	00101000
00000001	00000000	00000000	00000000	00000000	00101000
00000001	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000001	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000001	00000000	00000000	00010000	00000000	00000000
00000001	00000000	00100000	00010000	00000000	00000000
00000100	00000000	00000000	00010000	00000000	00000000
00000001	00000000	00000000	00010000	00000000	10000000
00010001	00000000	00000000	00010000	00000000	00000000
<\HS1C3-HR>

Padded for making exposure time in packets of 500ns
<HS-EXP1C3-HR>
00000100	00000000	00000000	00000000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00000000	00000000	00000000	00000000	00100000
00000001	00000000	00000000	00000000	00000000	00101000
00000001	00000000	00000000	00000000	00000000	00101000
00000001	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000001	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00000000
00000001	00000000	00000000	00010000	00000000	00000000
00000001	00000000	00100000	00010000	00000000	00000000
00000100	00000000	00000000	00010000	00000000	00000000
00000001	00000000	00000000	00010000	00000000	10000000
00010001	00000000	00000000	00010000	00000000	00000000
<\HS-EXP1C3-HR>

<EXP-NOHS1C3-HR>
00000100	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000000	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100000
00000001	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	01101000
00000001	00000000	00000000	00001000	00000000	01101000
00000001	00000010	00000000	00001000	00000000	00100010
